mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.member_name FROM (SELECT * FROM board WHERE member_id = #{member_id}) a inner join member b on a.member_id = b.member_id WHERE a.member_id = #{member_id} and board_title like '%'||#{search}||'%' OR board_content like '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY board_date DESC

SELECT c.myboardcount, c.myscrapcount, count(d.follow_id) as myfollowcount FROM (SELECT a.myboardcount, a.member_id, count(b.scrap_id) as myscrapcount FROM (select count(board_id) as myboardcount, member_id FROM BOARD WHERE member_id = #{member_id} GROUP BY member_id) a LEFT OUTER JOIN SCRAP b ON a.member_id = b.member_id GROUP BY a.myboardcount, a.member_id) c LEFT OUTER JOIN FOLLOW d ON c.member_id = d.member_id GROUP BY c.myboardcount, c.myscrapcount
SELECT count(follow_id) as followCheck FROM follow WHERE member_id = #{session_id} and follow_member_id = #{member_id}
SELECT member_name FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
